column1: good length, 133kph, wobbling across the left-hander and he leaves it alone
137kph, good length angled across, he leaves it alone again
141kph, good length on off, he drives but gets a thick inside edge that rolls to forward square leg
135kph, good length shaping away from Khawaja and he leaves it watchfully
play and miss, 140kph swinging away and bouncing past the edge as he drives on the up
good length, 138kph, angled across and he leaves again
good length wide of off, 131kph, he leaves
beaten prodding at a good length ball outside off that holds it's line wide of off

caught behind! Finch undone again by a cracker! Good length wide of off, Finch is worried about it coming back, he pushes forward, it hits the seam and nips away, catches the edge and an easy catch for Dhoni! What a delivery. Seam and bounce!

142kph, fuller length, he leans into a drive through cover-point, there's a mix up coming back for the third run! But they work it out and get home easily in the end. Lucky the throw was a little slow coming back. Both men stopped in the middle of the wicket for a moment
135kph, back of a length outside off, he's back and across and defending into the off side
138kph, good length, pitching outside leg, he's back and hit high on the pads and it rolls away to point
139kph, good length, top of off, he defends off the thick inside edge to midwicket
141kph, good length, top of off, he is forward and defending off a thick inside edge onto pad
139kph, angled down the leg side and rightly called wide
141kph, back of a length outswinger, he leaves and it swings after it passes the batsman causing Dhoni some issues, he fumbles but at not cost
137kph, good length fifth stump line, he leaves this alone wide of off
slightly over pitched and he just leans into a glorious straight drive past mid off! Supreme timing! Great shot
fuller outside off, he drives again but mistimes dragging it to midwicket off the inside half of the bat
136kph, back of a length, he's up on his toes punching to mid off
140kph, dragged down the leg side, he misses out glancing but it's a wide
swivels on a pull shot! Too short, into the ribs and Khawaja swivels on his back foot and pings a pull shot backward of square. Too easy for a player of his class.
145kph, fuller on off, he clips this neatly against the angle but straight to mid on
144kph, over-pitched outside off, he drives fluently but straight to cover
143kph good length outside off, he mistimes a drive to cover
141kph, good length angled across, he drives inside out to cover-point on the circle
135kph, good length, outswinger, he's watchfully leaving this alone
back of a length, he is back and across and defending
136kph, good length, fifth stump line, he leaves this alone again outside off
141kph, good length well wide of off and again he watches it go past without offering
140kph, good length, extra bounce nipping back he gets an inside edge into the groin and he crumples to the ground. That would not tickle
good length, 140kph, outswinger way wide of off but inside the guideline, Stoinis leaves
143kph, fuller length outside off, he leans into a drive to mid off
fuller outside off again, he frees this arms and drives firmly but straight to cover again
a waft and miss wide of off! It was 140kph, good length but wide, he tried to late cut with limited footwork and misses
big swing and miss driving on the up. Good length, angled in, bolt upright seam, it just shapes away late as the bat flashes at it
143kph, good length, top of off, he's squared up on the crease defending to point
138kph, back of a length outside off, he's back and opening the face to run this to third man for a single finally
beaten by extra bounce outside off! This was back of a length, he set up to cut and then it kicked up off a length and it bounced over the edge
beaten again by extra bounce outside off. Again he shaped to cut and again it bounced over the edge as he was surprised by the bounce
fuller length angled into off, he clips this nicely but straight to midwicket
134kph back of a length wide of off, he late cuts, glides it down to third man
141kph, good length, fourth stump line, he just defends nonchalantly to cover
136kph, back of a length, wide of off, again it kicks from a length but Stoinis lets it go
beaten by a superb delivery! It angled in, hit the seam, shaped away, he was squared up in a tangle as it went past the edge
glorious drive on the up past mid off! Wonderful stroke. Good length, but a firm stride forward got him in a great position to flow the hands through the line and he placed it perfectly
beaten again. Great comeback. Good length, outside off, angled in and shaping away, he defends on the walk but is beaten comprehensively
short and wide, he cracks a cut shot and Jadeja makes an unbelievable diving save! One handed save to prevent four runs.
slices a square drive in the air but in the gap at point! It races away. Not well timed, it was miscued, sliced off the outside half of the bat but it found the gap
beaten again! Superb from Bumrah. Back of a length, angling in, hitting the seam and climbing away past the groping edge
this might have slipped, way wide out of the hand swinging away
good length, outswinger, well wide, Stoinis happy to leave it alone
good length, wide of off, shaping away, 123kph, he leaves again
122kph, good length outswinger, this climbs off a length, he raises the bat and lets it go again
short and wide and he cuts this easily through the gap at backward point! It was only 119kph, wide and a gift that Stoinis put away with ease
slightly fuller and again wide of off, he is not tempted to play again
122kph, good length outswinger, wide of off, he leaves this alone again
tossed up and he's advancing to the pitch and driving to long off
tossed up on off, he skips out and chips a drive in the air briefly towards long on with the turn
he slips out and launches this straight of long off! Lovely footwork to get down to the pitch, he freed the arms and whacked it straight. Lovely strike
shorter length, he's back and punching to cover
he charges and gets a thick inside edge, just past leg stump! It runs fine for a couple
he dances early, the length is shorter, it dropped on him, he just thrust the pad and bat together to defend
full toss that swings wide of the guideline and is rightly called
120kph, back of a length wide of off, he's up on his toes punching off the back foot straight to cover
short and wide, 121kph, he cuts firmly but straight to deep point
122kph, this kicks off a length, he defends with hard hands and it flies off a thick edge through point to the sweeper
short and wide and he cuts hard, this time finer, past backward point and it races to the rope! Very good placement. He waited beautifully for that
121kph, good length outswinger, outside off, he is happy to leave
124kph, short and wide again, he cuts hard but straight to backward point this time
shorter on leg, he's back and whipping this through square leg to the sweeper
looped up outside off, 78kph, he is happy to leave again
tossed very high and full, he hammers a drive hard to straight long on and the fielder is stretched on the rope
skips out to a wider ball, is forced to adjust and push it through the gap at cover-point
tossed up outside off, he drives with ease to long off
good length, a hint of spin, he's back and defending awkwardly to cover-point
118kph, shorter length, fourth stump line, he cuts to Kohli who is in tight at point
short ball, it sits up and he cracks the pull shot through midwicket! A freebie from Shankar and he smoked it through midwicket
outswinger way wide of off, past the guideline and not called! Stoinis is furious
121kph, full outswinger, floated up and Stoinis hammers a drive straight of mid off! Hit with such power and disdain! He was filthy with the non wide call and took it out on the ball
fuller and wider, he drives firmly to deep cover-point
short on the hip, he flicks this away easily to deep backward square
tossed up, he reaches out and drives to cover-point
good length outside off, he pushes gently back to the bowler
brilliant reverse sweep! What a shot! he reverse swept a length ball and hammered it behind point! Sensational skill
tossed up, 86kph, he drives back to the bowler
floated up outside off, hint of spin, he mistimes a drive back to the bowler
shorter length, he's back and working this through square leg to the sweeper
looped up wide of off, he sits back and late cuts to backward point
slider way wide of off, he misses out late cutting
tossed up outside off, he drives back to the bowler
fired down the leg side, Dhoni can't glove it cleanly, they run two, it's not called wide!? It's runs! He didn't touch that
short and wide, he cuts and gets a edge off the toe that flies fine to third man for four!
he drives a full delivery to cover, and Kohli misfields to allow a single
fired into off, 92kph, he's back and defending
shorter length, he's back and punching firmly to long off
angled into leg stump, he's back and punching to midwicket
shorter length, he's back and mistiming a punch off the back foot
tossed up on off, he gently pushes this on the front foot to cover
90kph, good length on off, he sits back and defends to cover
flighted, outside off, and he drives it towards backward point
straight ball, tossed up at middle stump, 79kph, and he plays it away to the onside towards square leg
fired in from wider of the crease, 86kph, and he backs away and drives, but fielded well by Kohli at short cover
tossed up, and he drives it to the right of Kohli this time, towards extra cover
ooh...proper side of the arm ball. He goes back and defends from the crease
another low ball, slung towards leg stump, and he defends towards short midwicket
length ball, coming back in, and he defends towards short midwicket
advances and nurdles the ball towards midwicket. Sent back by the non-striker
length, outside off, and he drives. It is half-stopped by point
length, straight at off stump, and he goes back to defend
defends a length ball on off stump
length ball, strays on to the pads, and he can nudge this away towards square leg

low-grubber, and he advances and smacks it straight back down the wicket, taken by the bowler. The Indians want to appeal this. The umpires confer...the soft signal is not out. He came down the wicket, and smacked it straight into the ground, actually. Will stay not out
strays down the pads towards leg side, and he can swat this away towards fine leg
flat ball, and he drives it down to long on
low release again, as the ball angles in outside off, and he goes back to punch it towards extra cover
length ball, angles in, and he drives it back to the bowler
length, straighter, and he drives it towards long off, and Jadhav dives to his left to stop this
length, he goes back to cut, but cannot beat point
fuller, and he drives it with the turn towards long on
length, and he goes back and punches it to long on
delicate! Length ball, and he presses back and cuts it towards short third man
fuller, and he drives it towards long off

good ball! Turns a bit extra after pitching on a good length outside off. He was committed to looking to play this towards long off, but the turn takes it past the inside edge. Bounces over off stump, luckily for Khawaja

Jadhav strikes! A more conventional high release from Jadhav, and it is a half-tracker really. Stoinis looks to take full toll and whip it away through the midwicket region, but cannot clear Virat Kohli at short midwicket. Jadhav, and his Midas touch, strike again for India
flatter, straighter, and he drives it past the bowler towards long on
flighted, more outside off, and he chops it away towards point
flatter, straighter, and he drives it down towards long on
goes back to a length ball, and he punches it towards point
flighted, outside off, and he punches this towards extra cover. A little quicker at 93kph
length, and he flicks it towards midwicket
goes back to a length ball and punches it back down the pitch
flighted, outside off, and he drives towards cover. Missed by the fielder inside the circle, and that allows them to come back for the second
length ball, and he drives it back to the bowler
length ball, and he pushes it back to the bowler
fuller ball, and he looks to flick it away, but smacks it straight into his boot. It lifts up on the off side, but lands well short of Jadeja
tossed up, outside off, and he drives it towards cover
short, and he cuts it furiously, but cannot beat point
short, and he goes back in trying to pull, but gets no timing on it. Trickles away to short midwicket
presses forward to defend a length ball
flatter, bowled from wider, and he is able to nudge it away towards long leg. That brings up 50 for Khawaja. What a good knock this has been. Rode his luck early, but batted fluently since
length, and he punches it off the backfoot towards deep midwicket
length, turns back in from outside off, and he punches it to short cover
conventional leg-break, turns back in from a length, and he drives it back to the bowler
slow turn, back into him, and he plays it late to drive it down to long on
turns away from a fuller length, he plays it from the crease, but cannot time a flick right

uses his feet to get down to a length ball, but he has tonked it straight towards midwicket. Vijay Shankar does well to rush to his right, position himself perfectly, and take a very good catch! 'Vijay Shankar's wicket, more than Kuldeep Yadav's wicket,' says Sunil Gavaskar on air, and who are we to argue? Timely wicket for India, yet again!
airy drive off a leg-break back towards the bowler. Eventually goes well above him through to long
full ball, on the pads, and he whips it away towards midwicket
full ball, towards leg stump, and he flicks it towards square leg
flat ball towards leg stump again, and he plays it towards square leg again
straighter, and it gives him room to ease into a drive down towards long off
goes back to a flat ball and plays it towards point with an open face
flicks a flat ball on the pads towards deep midwicket
tossed up, and he flicks it from outside off stump towards long on
turns back into him from a length, and he punches it towards cover
full toss, outside off, and he hits it hard, but straight to Kohli at cover. Maxwell admonishes himself
tossed up, on middle, and he drives it down to long on
tossed up, and he drives it to long off
length ball, holds its line after pitching, and he plays it off the front foot watchfully. May have been the flipper, but Maxwell saw it through to a defensive push
length ball, and he defends from the crease
shorter, outside off, and he glides it down to third man
good ball! Rears off a length outside off, and draws a poke from Maxwell on its way through to MS Dhoni. That was bowled at 140.8kph
shorter in length, and he gets up on his toes and punches it towards extra cover. Shikhar Dhawan gets across but cannot stop it completely
length, cutting back in at 138kph, and he defends off the back foot

edged, but eludes Rohit Sharma at first slip! Good length, good pace, and just a hint of shape away from him, as he looked to drive it. Took the outside edge, but went fine enough to go to the left of Sharma at first slip
tossed up, and he drives it, and it almost carries back to Kuldeep
length, and he goes back and cuts it, but cannot beat point
shorter, and he goes back and punches it as it turns back in, but cannot beat short cover
flighted, outside off, and he comes forward and plays it down to long off
flighted, outside off, and he just eases into an extra cover drive. Eludes Kohli at covers, and also beats long off. Sheer timing!
shorter, and he goes back to drive it with the turn towards midwicket, but cannot beat short midwicket
length blal, comes back into him from outside off, 139kph, and he punches it towards backward point
fuller, straighter, and he drives it down the wicket. Rayudu gets to the ball, but they might want to check if he was able to stop it clean. He has. Perfect!
shot! Fuller, and a bit wider this time, and he cuts it towards third man. Uses the pace on the ball
slower ball, outside off, and he dabs it towards third man. Bowled at just 108.8kph, but Handscomb picked it up early
short, and he whips it away towards long leg. Never in control of it, but didn't time it well enough to have himself in any peril of holing out
length, and he defends from the crease this time. Bowled at 138.6kph
tosses it up, but overcooks the length, and he can stretch and slice this away through covers. Beautiful, inventive!
tossed up, and he cuts it, but cannot get it past point
length, and he goes back and cuts it viciously against the spin. Almost gets it beyond the in-field, but Vijay Shankar dives to his left and stops a certain boundary
length ball, and he cuts off the back foot
turns away from him and he defends this time

lured into it! Tossed up way outside off stump, and Handscomb came a long way down the track. The ball turns way inside a huge gap between bat and pad, and it comes to a gleeful Dhoni behind the wicket, with not a hope for Handscomb. He was having trouble reading Yadav's variations, and that has proved to be his downfall here
length ball, and he defends
flighted, and he drives it down towards long off
tossed up, and he drives it down to long off, to pick up his first runs in ODI cricket
tossed up, and he drives it handsomely, but cannot beat cover
flatter, towards leg stump, and he pushes it towards square leg
fuller, and he drives it to long off
tossed up, and he drives it down to long off
turns from outside off, and Turner is forced to fetch that as he plays it off the inside of the bat towards short midwicket
wrong 'un, tossed up, and he presses forward to defend it
turns into him from middle stump, and he can play this away off his pads towards square leg
tossed up, and he presses forward to meet it on the half-volley and push it towards midwicket
tossed up, and he presses forward and drives him down to long off
flighted, outside off, and he drives him to point
tossed up, and he forces him down the wicket towards long off
darts into him from a length, 90.8kph, and he plays him away towards point
fired in again at the leg stump, and he plays it towards point. 95.3kph
flighted, and he drives, but cannot beat Kohli at short cover
opens the face of the bat, and ensures a drive off a length ball goes towards extra cover
tossed up, and he drives this down towards long off
tossed up, and he plays it from the crease as it turns into him, pushing it to long off
wrong 'un, and he goes back and drives it back to the bowler
short, and he slashes it away after making some room for himself. Smashed through covers!
tossed up, and he defends the ball, which goes on with the arm
straighter one again, and he defends this off the crease
tossed up, and he drives it towards extra cover after pressing forward
length ball, and he shuffles across and flicks it away, but can't beat short midwicket
presses forward and pushes a drive down towards long on
short, and he takes full toll of this! Goes back and smashes this through midwicket. Did well to place it to the right of the man at short midwicket
drives a length ball to cover
drives a straight ball towards the bowler, who misses out on stopping this one
132kph, good length, top of off, he pushes on the front foot to cover
slower ball bouncer and he hammers it over midwicket for six! What a strike! He's played a lot of cricket at the WACA. A slow short ball is a gimmie for Turner
good length, nipping back and hits the top of the pads but was sliding down leg
135kph, good length, top of off, he stands tall and pushes off the front foot to cover
back of a length, 133kph, he slices this off the back foot to backward point and Jadeja makes a good stop
play and miss and a 135kph, good length ball. He was driving on the up and it just nibbled away a touch and past the edge. Good delivery
drifting into leg, he tucks this against the turn to midwicket
slid through, he beats the edge and he tries to late cut
full on middle, driven firmly to long on
tossed up on off, he defends with an open face to point
tossed up wide of off, he frees the hands and drives firmly to deep cover-point
fuller outside off, he drags a drive to long on
good length, top of off, he pushes off the front foot to mid on and they pinch one as the man is on the circle
133kph, back of a length on middle, he gets an inside edge onto thigh and it drops down onto the leg side, Maxwell calls him through for a single
full outside off, 137kph, he drives this superbly wide of mid off and the sub fielder Chahal makes a good diving stop to save four
full into leg stump, 137kph, he clips this with the angle easily behind square and they run an easy two

chopped on! Off cutter does the trick! Well bowled by Shami. It was a good length, top of the stumps length, he thought it was short enough to pull but it just gripped a touch, he got a little bottom edge onto the top of leg stump.
143kph, yorker outside off, he digs it out into the off side
full outside off, he square drives straight to point
floated up outside off, he opens the face and pushes this to the gap at cover-point for one
tossed up on off, he's forward and defending
flatter outside off, he sweeps nicely but straight to deep backward square
looped up on off, he pushes on the front foot to cover
fuller outside off, he drives very firmly to deep cover-point
136kph, back of a length off stump line, he's back and pushing this back to the bowler
back of a length, 127kph, on off, he turns this straight to midwicket
fuller length, 142kph, he tries to drive and gets it off the toe of the bat as it stays a fraction lower than expected
128kph, off cutter, he's back to the length ball and whipping it to midwicket but can't beat the fielder
slower ball off cutter, pushed down the leg side

bowled him! That's a huge breakthrough! Great delivery. This was a 136kph, good length delivery, it nipped back off the seam as Maxwell tried to drive, it slipped through the gate and flattened off stump! Wow. Huge moment
141kph, yorker first up, brilliantly dug out by Coulter-Nile
135kph, good length angled into off stump, he is back and defending
full, 136kph, into middle, he turns this with the angle to gap at midwicket
140kph, good length way wide of off, he flashes a drive and misses
over-pitched and he plays a classical straight drive back past the stumps at the non-strikers! Superb piece of timing. Lovely shot
half-volley, outside off, he drives very firmly to deep cover-point
beaten by a 141kph length ball that angled in and nipped away. He was squared up on the crease and beaten
tossed up outside off, he defends on the front foot to cover
wrong un, doesn't pick it, sat back and was beaten cold
short wrong un, he's back and miscuing a pull shot to the man at deep midwicket
tossed up outside off, he reaches out and sweeps through square leg
tossed very high, he drives back to the bowler
wrong un again, he tries to sweep is hit on the back thigh as he was through the shot, it was spinning and bouncing too much and Kuldeep was the only one to appeal
darted into leg, he's back and tucking this around the corner
round arm, straight on off, he drives to long on
round arm, slung in wide of off, it skids on as Carey leaves
another side arm, wide of off, he drives back to the bowler
slow side arm, Carey sets up for the reverse sweep with ample time and picks the gap at backward point! Great shot and good placement
shorter on off, he's back and punching this straight to cover
shorter wrong un, he was deceived, went back and checked a pull shot, got a bottom edge that went through Dhoni's legs for a couple
shorter wrong un, he's back and cutting firmly to deep point
looped up outside off, he pushes off the front foot through point
very full, he shaped to sweep, and he changed his shot, chipping it just past the bowler to long on
attempts to reverse sweep, is hit on the pad, they appeal, not out is the call. They discuss a review but don't take it. He was hit outside the line and it was turning away.
looped up outside off, he drives to cover
129kph, cutter, full on off, he pushes with an open face to point
142kph, full and fired into middle and leg, he glances dangerously from off the stumps to fine leg
111kph slower ball, that grips and climbs a touch, he rides the bounce and runs it to third man
141kph, full and speared into off, he gets a thick inside edge onto pad and rolls away into the off side
138kph, full yorker length into leg stump, he digs this out through midwicket
slower ball, 121kph, good length on leg, just tucked forward of square
138kph, back of a length on off, he is defending off the back foot
140kph, good length angled into middle, tucked to midwicket, they pinch a single, Jadeja hit the stumps but Coulter-Nile was well inside the crease
inside edge past off stump and it races to fine leg for four! A bit of luck. It was full outside off, tailing back, he drives and nearly chops on but gets a boundary
full angled into middle and leg, 142kph, he clears the front leg and drives to long on
slower ball, 113kph, good length on off, he defends towards point
slower ball, 114kph, he pushes gently to mid off who is back on the circle and they get an easy one
slower ball off cutter, he's back and punching this wide of cover
140kph, inswinging yorker, on off, he does well to steer this down to third man, using the pace
cracked past mid off! He cleared the right leg and got one in the slot and thumped a check drive past mid off in the circle!
132kph, good length on leg, cramping him, he tucks it forward of square
he skies a short ball miles in the air but just out of reach of long on! Shankar ran a low way but couldn't get there! Shankar maybe didn't pick that up early enough
he slices this full ball inside out over mid off! It was a half-volley and he sliced it up and over the man in the circle. He didn't nail it but got enough to reach the rope
beaten by a good length delivery that nipped away. He gave himself room but missed it trying to flash it through point
142kph, good length angled into middle and off, he is cramped and forced to defend
he dances down and stays leg side and misses again! It was 142kph, good length and following him. Beat him for pace
138kph, good length on off, he pushes gently towards mid on and gets off strike
slower ball, 118kph, leg cutter, he glides this to short third man but finds the man on the circle
118kph, slower ball, he checks his drive angling it straight to backward point
137kph, good length, he steps outside off trying to flick this over square leg but is hit on the pad
124kph, cutter, length ball, he just checks a drive to mid off on the circle and they get one
139kph, full into off, he gives room and drives nicely past cover wide of long off for a couple
back of a length, 135kph, he gives room and swings hard, flat batting it down to long on
full toss, he slices an outside edge along the ground to short third man and Bumrah misfields allowing a boundary! He should have stopped that. Got both hands to it and let it through
124kph, slower ball cutter, he mistimes it back to the bowler and Shami misfields to allow a single this time
120kph, slower ball outside off, completely deceives Carey as he swings and misses way too early
a thick outside edge runs fine! Shorter slower ball, he swings hard and gets an edge that flies well wide of Dhoni and fine of short third man!
112kph, slower ball too straight and Carey flicks this off his hip up and over backward square! Too straight to Carey who loves it there
143kph, good length into middle and leg, he stays leg side and steers this to backward point who is hanging back on the circle

caught at long on! 135kph, back of a length, cramping him for room as he tried to launch it over wide long on, he miscues down the ground and straight down the throat of Kohli on the rope and he takes the catch easily
141kph, shorter length, he gives room and chops and inside edge past leg stump for a single
starts with a length ball, on leg stump, and he eases into a flick through the midwicket region
fuller, outside off, and he presses forward to defend
length ball, shapes back into him, 128.6kph, and he defends
length, pitches on leg, and just stops a bit. Takes the outside edge as he looks to flick, but lands just in front of Rohit
fuller, swings back in, and he looks to drive this, but cannot beat mid on. Bowled in the mid 130s, and Behrendorff was excited wth the little sight of the stumps he could get
swings back in from outside off, at 135.8kph, and he looks to drive it. Goes off the inside of the bat towards short midwicket
breakthrough! Pitched up, and just angles across him, and he looks to drive, but skews it in the air towards point. Comfortable catch, and exactly the start that Australia would have wanted
full ball, and he defends it after getting behind the line
swing, from outside off, 136kph, and moving further away, and he shoulders arms
length, moving away, and takes the outer part of Kohli's bat as he stretches to defend. Bowled at 138.7kph, and he did well to keep it down on its way towards gully
length, outside off, and moving further away, and he leaves. This went at 136.5kph
seaming away from outside the off stump, after pitching on a good length, and he lets it pass
length, angles across Rohit, who lets it pass
length, angles into him again, and he plays a skewed drive towards mid on. They think about a single, but Kohli is quick to send Rohit back
fuller, but on the pads, and he plays it away towards square leg
length, straight at off stump, bowled at 133kph, and he presses forward to defend
fuller, towards the pads, and he looks to play a flick. Bowled at 135.8kph, but appeared to grip a bit on the pitch
length, coming back into him, and he defends away towards short midwicket
full, but wide, and Rohit eases into a square drive. Gets the placement right too, making sure he puts this between point and cover
length, outside off, and moving further away, and he leaves
length, outside off, moving away at 137.8kph, and he leaves
length, outside off, and he lets this pass
length, outside off, and swinging away at 137.9kph and he lets it pass
length, closer to the stumps, but still swinging away, and he lets it pass
length, and the ball angles across him, and stops as he looks to flick! Goes in the air, but just about clears mid off. Lucky!
length ball, angles across him, and he leaves
length, angles away from him after shaping in a touch. Beautiful bowling, as it just goes past Rohit's outside edge, as he was looking to defend off the front foot
leaves him off a length this time. Not very rapid (131.2kph) but beautiful line and length. Beats the outside edge yet again
length, outside off, and this time he defends from the crease
fuller ball, and he has come down with an angled bat and just guided it down past the man at point, and the timing is good enough to even beat third man to his right!
length, outside off, and he eases into a cover drive, but goes like a rocket to the man at short cover
fuller ball, and he goes across the stumps and flicks it away towards the square leg fence. Delicious!
length, dipping into him, and he presses forward to defend it. Wants a quick single, but sent back by Rohit
length ball, cuts back into him at 137.4kph, and he comes forward and defends it towards point
short, and he latches on to it! Swivel-pulls this away off the back foot, and has placed it well enough to get it to the left of fine leg, who is quite square
presses forward to meet a length ball, and plays it down towards short midwicket
length, straight, and he defends. This was bowled at 134.9kph
length ball, straightens into him, and he defends it watchfully under his eyes
fuller, and he goes with the full flow of his bat, swinging it down to the long on fence. The line was across him, but the length allowed him to hit through the line of it
length ball, zips away from him. Half-appeal from Carey as it beats the outside edge through to the keeper
length, angles away, and again beats the outside edge. This has been an excellent but unlucky opening spell. Could have had both batsmen!

length, a bit wider, and he chases it, but misses. Through to Carey, as Behrendorff raises an arm in exasperation. Probably wondering what he needs to do to just get that little bit of luck he has lacked thus far!
starts with a shorter ball, that jags back into him, and he inside-edges it on to his thigh pad, but the ball drops close to him
bounce, and beats the outside edge as it moves further away. Kohli has a nibble at it, but misses out on contact
short, but down the leg side. Kohli looks to pull out the glance, but misses out. Half-stopped by Carey, but they cross over as it is called a wide anyway
angles into him at good pace, and he defends this length ball
rears off a good length, and takes the shoulder of the bat as Rohit shapes to defend. Beats the man at gully, and runs down towards third man
length, 139.4kph, and comes back into him. Kohli looks to drive this off the back foot, but it goes inside the line of the bat. Could easily have chopped this one on...
short, angles into him at 140.8kph, and he gets up on his toes to play this towards short midwicket
length ball, angles across him, and this time Rohit is able to defend from the crease. Drops it with soft hands towards point
pulls out the paddle shot! Length ball, that was straighter, and he moved into position quite early, and just helped it around the corner to the fine leg fence, using the pace of the ball
length ball, angles across him, and he defends it towards point
length, angles across him, 130kph, and he leaves
length, and he goes back and defends him from the crease as the ball shapes back into him
length, outside off, and he slashes this hard. It runs down to third man on one bounce
length ball, outside off, and he defends this off the front foot
length, and it rears off after pitching just outside off! Rohit goes chasing, but cannot touch it on its way through to Carey. Terrific bowling
fuller, and he comes down with a straight bat. It runs off the outside edge and goes through the slips cordon down to third man. Good zip, and needs the backing of his fielders here

short, and he has swung this around towards long leg. Took on the short ball as soon as he spotted the shortening of the length, and just went through with the pull, not worrying about keeping it down!
brisk, angles back into him off a shorter length, and he defends this
short, jags back into him as he rises to meet this, and is able to dab it down towards square leg, possibly off his glove. Good response to that six by Cummins, with some accurate, fast bowling
length ball, angles across him, and he presses forward to defend this
shot! Shimmies down the pitch to get to the pitch of a good length ball, and whiplashes it straight down the pitch, just past the umpire to his left. Through to the long off fence for four!
length ball, straightens into him, and he flicks it towards short midwicket
length ball, straightens into him again, and he defends it straight down the pitch
length, angles across him, he plays it with soft hands towards point, and wants a single, but the man there is quick to get across to it. Maxwell makes sure they change their mind
moves towards the ball, and converts a length ball into a near half-volley on leg stump, whipping it away down to long leg

rears off a length, and has hit Rohit on the arm! This was bowled at 133kph, but Cummins has been getting good length balls to rise up easily. This one beat Rohit's bat as he shaped to defend, and thudded into his elbow
length ball, and he gets behind the line to defend this ball. It was delivered at 146kph
short, outside off, cutting back in at 144ks, and he gets up on his toes to defend this towards point
length, outside off, and seaming in at 144kph, and he looks to drop it down towards long leg, but misses out. Plays outside the line of it, in fact
short, and he gets up on his toes and guides this one towards short midwicket
length, outside off, and he leans into a punch drive square of the wicket on the off side. He has point out by the fence now, though
tossed up outside off, and he drives it towards extra cover
goes on straighter after pitching on a good length, and he goes back to flick it towards backward square leg
tossed up, and he comes forward to meet it on the volley and drive it with his wrists towards long on
tossed wide, and he has enough room to play it square towards point. The man does well to ensure the scoring is kept down from two
tossed up, driven back down the wicket towards the bowler
fired down the leg side, and hits him on the pad as he looks to flick. Zampa puts in an appeal, but no way that this one was going to strike the leg stump
length ball, jags back into him at 146.6k, and he defends. it drops on the pitch, and nearly runs on to the stumps...
short, and a bit wide, and he can use the pace of 139.7kph on that ball to run it towards third man
length, outside off, and lures him into a drive on the walk. Misses the outside edge as it swings away at 141kph. Beautiful bowling...too good for Rohit, in fact!
length, cuts back into him, and he gets up on his toes to defend this
short, and wide, and he is able to go back and cut this down towards third man. Well guided, past a fly slip that they have in position for Cummins
short, at off stump, and he taps it down on the off side. Wants a quick single, but quickly asked to go back by Rohit Sharma
length, and he goes back and punches it towards extra cover
short, and he goes back and thumps it towards midwicket. There's a good effort from the man at backward square leg, but he cannot do enough to deny him four!
plays this off the front foot, reads a googly well to run it down towards long leg
goes back and punches a length ball angling into him, past short midwicket
wrong 'un, and goes back into Rohit who was shaping to defend this. Inside edge, but only on to his feet
tossed up, and he presses forward to meet it on the half-volley. Defended back down the pitch

Kohli chips down the wicket, trying to force him down the wicket. Gets an inside edge towards short midwicket. Moment of hesitation between the batsmen, but they pick up the overthrow after a wayward attempt at the striker's end
length, angles into him, and he plays it away off his pads towards square leg
length, outside off, and he pushes it away towards extra cover. Bowled at 133.4kph
length ball, and he drops it down towards short midwicket
length, and he presses forward and runs the ball down towards third man on the move
length, straighter ball, and he walks across and flicks this towards midwicket
length ball, and he presses forward to defend
short ball, and he goes back, but drags a pull down towards backward square leg
tossed up, and he drives it down towards deep midwicket
goes on with the arm, and he looks to cut, gets the top edge, but it runs away with the pace of the ball, and beats short third man. Lucky boundary!
nothing lucky about this! Full ball, and he slams it down the wicket, using his wrists to guide it straight down towards long on. To the left of long on, in fact

he presses forward for a length ball that straightens into him, and it's not given. But Australia have referred this! Certainly looked close, and it has hit the pad first in fact! Should now be a question of the line of it...pitches in line, impact in line, and hitting the wickets. Massive wicket for Australia to have picked up!
135kph, fuller, angled into middle and off, he leans on a forward push to mid on
130kph, good length outside off, he defends with soft hands to cover-point, looks for one but it's not on
128kph, shorter length on leg, it stays down a touch, he swivels and pulls fine to fine leg
128kph, good length extracts an outside edge but it falls well short of slip. Rayudu using soft hands
134kph, fuller on off, he drives very firmly with the full face straight to mid off
127kph, shorter length into the hip, he tucks this into the gap at square leg with ease
over-pitched and Rayudu gets a wonderful stride into a drive placing beautifully into the gap at cover! Nice stroke to get going
good length angled into off, he defends into the covers
back of a length, it climbs off a length, he defends off the sticker but controls it well to drop it into the off side
138kph, full into leg stump, he clips this nicely through backward square and they push hard and get two easily
131kph, good length, wide of off, he's happy to allow this to go through to the keeper
134kph, good length fourth stump line and again it leaps off a length, wisely Rayudu raises the bat and lets it fly through to Carey
129kph, good length angled into middle and off, he turns this off the front foot to wide fine leg, they look for two but it's not on
back of a length, on middle and off, he is back and across and tucking this behind square
good length top of off, he turns this with the angle square of midwicket
132kph, fuller outside off, he drives inside out straight to cover-point
132kph, fuller outside off, he drives nicely through cover-point but Maxwell is diving full length to his right to make the save. Brilliant from Maxwell

short ball and he pulls, not in control, but it lands between fine and deep backward square and finds the rope! It was 130kph, head high bouncer, he hit it in the air for a long way but it split the two men
134kph, fuller length outside off, he drives elegantly to cover but no run
138kph, angled into off stump, he drives with the full face to mid on
big swing and miss. It was a 135kph length ball outside off, he tried to heave this over long on, lost his shape and missed it by a margin
wide of the crease, good length angled into the top of off and he defends from the crease

leading edge caught at mid off! Massive wicket for Australia. Cross seam delivery angled into middle and off, it just stopped in the surface a touch, Rohit closed the face too soon trying to work it to the leg side, got a leading edge that ballooned high in the air, straight to mid off, Finch stood under it and took the catch
132kph, good length wide of off, he leaves this alone through to Carey
89kph leg break, slides on, he's forward and defending on the front foot
tossed very high and wide of off, he square drives through cover-point to the sweeper
fuller, drifting into off stump, he pushes gently off the front foot to cover
flatter outside off, he punches a drive to long off with his wrists
shorter length, skidding on, he's back and punching it back to the bowler
leg break, flatter on middle, he defends from the crease
132kph, good length, wide of off, hint of tail back in and MSD watches it all the way past without offering a shot
136kph, good length, angled into off, he defends on the front foot towards mid off
134kph, good length, he's back and across, squared up a touch and shovelling a defensive push to point
138kph, half-volley outside off, he drives firmly to cover but Cummins makes a very athletic diving save to his left. Saved certain runs.
shorter into the hip, he's back and knocking this around the corner to wide fine leg
138kph, fuller outside off, he drives flowingly but without timing to Finch at mid off
shorter length, skids on into leg stump, he's back and gets an inside edge onto pad
very full, dipping, he drives with the bottom hand pushing it to long off

caught behind! Nice leg break catches the outside edge! Zampa changing the game. He flighted this outside off, not many have turned, this one turned just enough, Rayudu reached out to defend, it scratched the edge and Carey took a good catch. The silence is deafening.
good length leg break, he reaches out and covers this with the full face
full and drifting in, he jams the bat down in defence
drifting into leg stump, he turns this neatly into the gap at forward square to get off the mark
good length, climbing into the thigh pad of Jadhav at 133kph
angled into leg stump, 141kph, he glances this with ease to fine leg
he hooks off the top edge and it flies fine and safe, one bounce four! it was a quality bouncer, he just hooked it hope and it landed safely very fine
good length, top of off, he defends squared up on the crease
fuller length, 143kph, he pushes on the front foot to mid on
back of a length, top of off, 144kph, good pace, he defends with soft hands
drifting in, sliding onto the front pad but it was drifting down leg
fuller on middle and off, he leans forward and smothers the spin
nicely flighted, he defends on the front foot
short dragged down delivery, he's back and in a flash and smacking this through midwicket with no one defending on the rope! Easy pickings
full toss outside off, he hammers this along the ground to long on
tossed up, 86kph, very full, he drives back to the bowler
137kph, back of a length, on off, he's up on his toes knocking it down to his feet
142kph, back of a length, off stump line again, he's back and across and defending with the full face
140kph, back of a length, off stump line again, he defends awkwardly, knocking it down
short ball, 135kph, and Jadhav has no idea about it, he half ducked before thrusting his bat infront of his face to knock it down
half-volley into leg stump, the pressure released and he clips this away beautifully forward of square, Handscomb has a long chase from behind square and makes the diving save to prevent four
fuller outside off, he drives with his feet anchored, pushing to mid off
124kph, slower ball, good length outside off, he steps down the track and defends off the inside half of the bat
back of a length, on middle, he tucks this behind square
angled into leg stump, he pushes this slowly towards mid on and they pinch a tight single as the man was hanging back on the circle
134kph, back of a length outside off, he's squared up a touch knocking this towards point
131kph, back of a length, leaping up into the ribs and he defends off the sticker of the bat
back of a length, 133kph, he's back and defending back to the bowler
tossed up on middle, he defends on the front foot from the crease
leg break, a bit of turn well wide of off and he leaves
slider stays a touch low, he's back and slapping this down the ground to long on
drifting down the leg side, he tried to sweep it fine but missed but they get the wide call anyway
tossed up, 92kph, on leg, he defends on the front foot
he skips down to a good length ball and knocks it with the bottom hand to midwicket
lofted inside out over cover! Superb from Jadhav. It was looped up outside off, he stayed leg side, lifting it with the turn up and over cover, beautifully timed and controlled.
back of a length, nipping in and surprising Dhoni, catching him on the thigh pad as he tried to whip square
134kph, full, shaping in a touch, he drives but gets a thick inside edge that flies to fine leg
128kph, short ball, he pulls with control through square leg for a single
134kph, fuller on off, he pushes with the bottom hand towards mid on who is inside the circle to save one
slower ball, 114kph, he caresses this into the gap at cover-point
130kph, good length, top of off, Jadhav turns the wrists nicely using the angle to work it behind square
90kph low full toss drifting in, he just drops the bat on it to defend
92kph, half-volley outside off, he drives neatly to long off
95kph, pushed through, shorter length outside off, he's back and cutting straight to backward point
looped up outside off, he pushes a drive to long of with that trademark reach out flick
drifting into leg, he just pushes this on the front foot to midwicket
good length, over spinner outside off, nice flight and drop, he defends to cover
131kph, fuller length on off stump, he pushes a checked drive to cover
good length on leg, he's back and tucking this through square leg to the sweeper in the deep
he sits deep in the crease and works this from middle stump down to fine leg

nearly caught and bowled! This climbed off a length, he tried to work to leg, got a leading edge off the shoulder of the bat, Dhoni taking the bottom hand off the back, it popped up but Stoinis couldn't get to it diving forward
short ball, Dhoni takes it on, hooking it flat, rolling the wrists enough to have it land well short of wide fine leg
134kph, good length on off, he defends with soft hands square of midwicket for a single
123kph, cutter, length ball on middle, he turns this against the angle behind square
126kph, fuller outside off, he shovels a drive with the bottom hand to mid off
138kph short ball, he pulls powerfully but straight to the man at deep square leg for one
another leading edge that drops short of point! It climbed off a length, catches the shoulder of the bat but the hands were soft enough that it deep reach Maxwell running in
beaten trying to run this third man. Dangerous shot with the angle and the inconsistent bounce
full and driven firmly but he can't beat the man at mid off on the circle
short ball, along the leg side, and he flicks it towards square leg
strays down the leg side. Jadhav was shuffling across, but it would have strayed down leg even if he had been standing still
short ball, and rears up again, and he is able to ride the bounce this time and play it down on the offside. Just 122kph, but still reared up!
length ball, and he presses forward to defend this
short ball, and he shapes to pull, and executes it well. Uses force to get this in front of square
short, jags back into him, and he takes his bottom hand off and plays it down near his body on the off side
length ball, and he drives it down to mid off
comes down the wicket and tries to force a length ball down the leg side past the bowler. Gets an inside edge down towards long leg instead!
length ball, and he plays it off his toes towards square leg
fuller, and he drives it, but it rockets straight to mid off
short, and he has pulled this in front of square. Done well to keep it to the right of short midwicket
length ball, and he pushes it through covers for a single
fuller ball, but down the leg side. He looks to flick it towards square leg, and there's a short appeal from Behrendorff, but surely he realises this was pitching outside leg?
full, wide, and he pushes it through covers. They run this well, and bring up the 50 of this partnership
short, and he has pushed this down towards short midwicket. Eludes the man there, but is fielded by the mid on, rushing away to his right and sliding to stop this
length ball, cutting back into him, and he plays it off his pads towards long leg
short, and wide outside off, and he cuts it down towards point
full, and wide outside off, and he cuts it down towards third man
short ball, angles into him at 132kph, and he jumps up on his toes and tucks it down towards square leg
strays down the pads, and Dhoni gets a bit of bat on to it. That's all he needed...all the way down to fine leg!
length ball, straighter into him, and he goes back and defends towards short cover
length ball, and he goes back to punch it towards short cover
length ball, straight at him, and he defends
length ball, and he pushes it towards mid off. Jadhav wants one, but is sent back midway. Could have been trouble if Finch had collected that...
length, and he goes back as it comes down the leg side and pulls it away towards long leg
length, outside off, and he drives it towards short cover
lofted a length ball, from outside off, and makes it carry over the midwicket fence! Good power to get that ball from outside off towards the gap

tries a lofted shot to a short ball again, and this time Stoinis has gotten to the ball! Has he taken it, though? The soft signal is not out, so there needs to be conclusive evidence to get this in the fielder's favour. Short ball again, and Stoinis went across from mid on, and stuck his left hand out. From visual evidence, it looks like it has bounced. Should be not out
fuller ball, and he gets the outside edge...for four! Pitches on middle, and then he is squared up as he tries to flick. It picks up the outside edge, and runs down to third man
length, outside off, and he defends
short ball, and he is squared up again, but does well to defend up on his toes
length ball, hits the bat hard at 136.8kph, as Jadhav defends from the crease
length ball, and he comes forward to defend
length, outside off, and he defends it towards point. This was bowled at 139.7kph
short, and he goes back and then runs it down towards third man. Better timed than it looked at first glance. What a shot!
short, and he plays it off his body as the ball angles into him, down towards fine leg
length, and he drives it back towards the bowler. A little uppish, but wide of the bowler, towards short cover
length ball, pitches on middle and leg, and Jadhav plays him watchfully from the crease
short, and he can latch on to this, gets it towards deep midwicket
presses forward to defend a length ball on off stump
looks to sweep a fuller ball pitching outside off. Plays over the ball, and Carey quickly whips the bails off. Backfoot well in though
length ball, turns away and bounces a bit, and he goes back to defend towards point
flatter, quicker, and he goes back and plays it down towards long on. Bowled at 92.5kph
length, and he runs it down towards third man
short, and comes into his body. He shapes to pull it, but it goes into his midriff. Perhaps a bit of an inside edge as well, as it goes into his solar plexus
length, outside off, and he drives it towards backward point, leaning into the shot
length ball, and he goes back and pulls this, but cannot beat short midwicket
length ball, tries to run it down past point, but there's no getting beyond Maxwell...
shorter, and he jabs it away through midwicket. Gets the placement absolutely right!
length ball, down leg side, and he nudges it away towards square leg
length ball, 131.6kph, and it bounces on him as he looks to flick it. Forced to plop it down the wicket
slower ball, pitched up, and he has latched on to this. Punches it down the ground, and beats a diving mid on
short, and he whips it away towards deep midwicket. The batsmen amble through for this. No great rush...
length ball, and he eases it towards short cover
length ball, straight, angles across him, and he dead-bats it down the pitch
pitched up, and he drives it towards short cover. Good stop, but they ran through for this
length ball, and he shimmies down the pitch and converts it into a fuller ball. Plays it down towards long on. They consider going back for two, but decide against it...
length ball, and he pushes it towards short cover. Misfield, and he wants one, but Finch covers up from conventional cover, and rifles a throw in
length, and he goes back to defend this towards short midwicket
short, and he goes back and gets it towards backward square leg. Wants two, but has to turn it down, as Handscomb is very fast to the ball and to release it
slower ball, and he runs it down to fine leg. They want two...and get there. FIFTY for Jadhav!
length ball, and he pushes it to covers, and sets off...makes it!
length ball, and he is forced to defend it off the crease. Bowled at 138.2kph
short, and he has guided this over the keeper, down to third man for four!
length ball, and he eases it through covers
length ball, outside off, takes the pace off it at just 121kph, and he cuts it towards point
short, fast (142kph) and he hops on to the back foot to defend
short ball, and he rides the bounce to play it down to long leg. They walk this single
fuller ball, towards leg, and he flicks it down to long leg. He hobbles on his way to the other side
slower ball, off-cutter, and he walks across the ball and flicks it down towards long leg
length, outside off, and he looks to go down the wicket, but gets the outside edge! It flies down to third man, on the first bounce, though
short ball, and he has fetched this all the way to backward square leg. Well played, because he had to keep this to the left of long leg, and did it perfectly!
length, angles into him, and he pushes it down to long on
he goes back and pushes a length ball towards deep midwicket. A misfield allows them to come back for two. That is very un-Australian!
tossed up, and he launches into a cover drive. Inside out, lofting it over the infielders. Terrific stuff!
presses forward to defend a length ball on off stump, turning further away
turn from outside off, and he defends it from the crease
comes down the wicket to flick a length ball, gets rapped on the pads, but it went off the inside edge
fuller ball, and he dunks it down the wicket towards long on
length, outside off, and he plays it with a dead bat
fuller, and he plays it with the incoming angle towards long leg
straighter ball, and he walks across his crease and drops it down towards long leg
slower ball, and he goes back and flicks it with the angle into his body and nurdles it down towards long leg
short ball, into his body at 131kph, and he pulls it down towards long leg
short, but he will have to re-bowl this. Starts from middle and leg, and then goes further down the leg side, and Carey has to collect
length ball, and he defends from the crease
length ball, and he drives it straight to mid on, and takes off. Makes the crease at the other end to a rapturous applause. FIFTY for Mahendra Singh Dhoni!
length ball, and he walks across the stumps and nurdles the ball down towards long leg
full, and he drives this hard, but straight towards mid off
slower ball, outside off, and he fetches this from there and pulls it towards backward square leg
full ball, and he flicks it towards short midwicket. Misfield allows them to come back for two
length ball, and he has eased into this...and lofted it beyond midwicket. What a shot!
short ball, and he short-arm jabs it beyond point. Super timing on that shot!
lofts this over the infield. And that's that...with Jadhav and Dhoni both batting magnificently to take India home after a wobble in their chase!
